casebody.data:
STAPLE SEWING AIDS PENSION MONEY PURCHASE PLAN, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
George ZAHODNICK individually and as Co Administrator of the Estate of Richard Zahodnick, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
Theresa Miller individually and as Co Administrator of the Estate of Richard Zahodnick, Stephan Zahodnick, Michael Zahodnick, Husband of Theresa Miller, and Wife of Stephan Zahodnick, Wife of Michael Zahodnick, Defendants. C-966 September Term 2017
080789 Supreme Court of New Jersey. Filed June 22, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005018-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
